text:
The handling of endorsed libraries is not properly done. The patch attached to
this bug creates a endorsed library directory in the webapp lib dir and takes
care that the relevant libraries are copied in and out (e.g. servlet container)
of this directory. For the patch to work create an empty directory
'lib/endorsed' in the lenya base dir. Finally, endorsed libraries are removed
from the common lib (duplicates) dir.
creator: felix.roethenbacher@wyona.com
felix.roethenbacher@wyona.com
text:
Created attachment 16219
Patch to fix endorsed library handling.

creator: thorsten@apache.org

Thanks Felix.
